Text: Hilal railway station formerly Istravoz railway station is a railway station located in İzmir, Turkey.

<Text: Hilal railway station:  "Istravoz" (from Greek σταυρóς) means Cross in Turkish.>

<Text: Hilal railway station:  After the Republic of Turkey was formed in 1923, the station's name was changed to "Hilal" which means 'crescent', due to the majority of the city's population being Muslim.>

Text: Hilal railway station:  The Hilal subway station, which opened in 2000, is located adjacent to the railway station.
